author: Travis Kosarek

inputs.name: serviceAccountAuthentication
inputs.label: GCP Service Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a service account to authenticate with when executing gcloud commands

inputs.name: dockerFilePath
inputs.label: Docker File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the Dockerfile to use. Must be within the Docker build context.

inputs.name: gcpContainerRegistry
inputs.label: Google Container Registry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Google Container Registry to target

inputs.name: gcpDockerProjectName
inputs.label: GCP Project ID

inputs.name: gcpDockerImageName
inputs.label: Image Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Docker image to build

inputs.name: gcpDockerImageTag

inputs.name: gcpDockerImageLatestTag
